change.description: Note possible dagesh in the first nun and weak dot in tsere under the tav. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: yod hiriq nun sheva tav dagesh tsere final-nun maqaf
change.changeuni: yod hiriq nun sheva tav dagesh tsere final-nun maqaf

notes.note: The text is in good condition near this word. A reddish blob appears in nun; it is poorly formed and ill-positioned, compared to the dagesh in the tav. The blob will not be transcribed as a dagesh. The leading dot in the tsere under the tav is reddish and small but well-formed and well positioned. It will remain a tsere.
BHL has no dagesh in the nun and a tsere under the tav. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Remove meteg under dalet and remove dagesh from yod.
change.refuni: dalet dagesh qamats meteg nun hiriq yod dagesh tsere tipeha alef lamed
change.changeuni: dalet dagesh qamats nun hiriq yod tsere tipeha alef lamed

notes.note: Neither a meteg under the dalet nor a dagesh in the yod are apparent in the LC. Ben Denckla: "... though the tsere and tipeḥa are displaced very "late," we still transcribe them as belonging to the yod, not the alef. They are "late" probably not only because of the inherent narrowness of the yod, but also because we see the somewhat-common "yod nested in nun" construct here".
BHL has no meteg under the dalet; it does have a dagesh in the yod. BHLA has no meteg under the dalet and no dagesh in the yod.

change.description: Change merkha to meteg under dalet. Ignore possible dagesh.
change.refuni: dalet hiriq merkha yod
change.changeuni: dalet hiriq meteg yod

notes.note: This is the second of 3 די in this verse, not counting the initial ודי. A reddish, small, but well-positioned dot appears in the dalet. Because the dalet has a clear rafe mark on the dalet no dagesh will be transcribed. No maqaf appears on this word in the LC.

BHL has a meteg after a hiriq on the dalet and the word ends with a maqaf. No dagesh appears in the dalet. BHLA has meteg after a hiriq in the dalet without a dagesh in the dalet and without a final maqaf.

change.description: Segol under the dalet has a weak lower dot. Add a note 't'.
change.refuni: vav sheva telisha-gedola he patah dalet dagesh segol qof segol tav
change.changeuni: vav sheva telisha-gedola he patah dalet dagesh segol qof segol tav

notes.note: The dot below the tsere is reddish and light; however, it is well-sized and well-positioned. The text does not have many extraneous dots near this word. The vowel will continue as segol.
BHL has a tsere under the dalet. BHLA has a segol under the dalet with a '?' in parentheses.

change.description: Add dagesh to he.
change.refuni: alef hataf-segol lamed qamats munah he
change.changeuni: alef hataf-segol lamed qamats munah he dagesh

notes.note: The he has a smudge in its trailing leg. In that smudge is a dot in contact with the interior of the leg that is well-sized and distinct. It will be transcribed as a dagesh.
BHL has a dagesh in the he. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Add dagesh to tet.
change.refuni: bet dagesh tsere lamed sheva tet sheva shin shin-dot patah alef tsadi dagesh patah resh pashta
change.changeuni: bet dagesh tsere lamed sheva tet dagesh sheva shin shin-dot patah alef tsadi dagesh patah resh pashta

notes.note: A dark, well-formed, slightly off-positioned dagesh is evident in the tet.
BHL has no dagesh in the tet. BHLA has a dagesh in the tet.

change.description: Add dagesh to tet.
change.refuni: bet dagesh tsere lamed sheva tet sheva shin shin-dot patah alef tsadi dagesh patah geresh resh
change.changeuni: bet dagesh tsere lamed sheva tet dagesh sheva shin shin-dot patah alef tsadi dagesh patah geresh resh

notes.note: A dark and well-positioned dagesh is evident in the tet.
BHL has no dagesh in the tet. BHLA has a dagesh in the tet.

change.description: Add dagesh to tet.
change.refuni: bet dagesh tsere lamed sheva tet sheva shin shin-dot patah alef tsadi dagesh patah resh pashta
change.changeuni: bet dagesh tsere lamed sheva tet dagesh sheva shin shin-dot patah alef tsadi dagesh patah resh pashta

notes.note: The name בלטשאצר appears 3 times in this verse. Of these 3 instances, word 14 is the second instance and the only one in the LC which has a dagesh in the tet.
BHL has no dagesh in any instance of בלטשאצר in this verse. BHLA has a dagesh in the second (this) instance of the word.

change.description: Change hiriq to sheva under pe.
change.refuni: vav dagesh pe hiriq shin shin-dot sheva resh tsere alef pashta
change.changeuni: vav dagesh pe sheva shin shin-dot sheva resh tsere alef pashta

notes.note: A clear sheva is present under the pe.
BHL has a hiriq under the pe. BHLA has a sheva under the pe.

change.description: Remove dagesh from vav.
change.refuni: yod sheva het patah vav dagesh hiriq nun dagesh patah zaqef-qatan nun hiriq yod
change.changeuni: yod sheva het patah vav hiriq nun dagesh patah zaqef-qatan nun hiriq yod

notes.note: No dagesh is evident in the vav.
BHL has a dagesh in the vav. BHLA has no dagesh in the vav.

change.description: Add dagesh to he.
change.refuni: dalet dagesh sheva nun qamats meteg he sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: dalet dagesh sheva nun qamats meteg he dagesh sof-pasuq

notes.note: Although the dot in the he is slightly reddish, it is well-sized and well-positioned.
BHL has no dagesh in the he. BHLA has a dagesh in the he.

change.description: Examine vowel under yod as possible tsere, rather than segol.
change.refuni: dalet dagesh qamats nun hiriq yod dagesh segol zaqef-qatan alef lamed
change.changeuni: dalet dagesh qamats nun hiriq yod dagesh segol zaqef-qatan alef lamed

notes.note: Although irregular and smeared, the mark under the two dots of the putative tsere is dark and well-positioned.
BHL has a tsere under the yod. BHLA has a segol under the yod.

change.description: Examine possible vav following mem.
change.refuni: alef qubuts mem patah yod dagesh qamats darga alef
change.changeuni: alef qubuts mem patah yod dagesh qamats darga alef

notes.note: The trailing lower vertical component of the mem is split. This is likely due to ink fracturing and removal than an intentional added vav.
BHL has no vav after the mem. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Ambiguous vowel under the bet. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: tav hiriq tav sheva het patah bet dagesh patah zaqef-qatan lamed
change.changeuni: tav hiriq tav sheva het patah bet dagesh patah zaqef-qatan lamed

notes.note: The text quality is poor. The vowel under the bet is ambiguous and might be a qamats.
BHL has a patah under the bet. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Remove dagesh from he.
change.refuni: vav sheva lamed tsere qadma he dagesh
change.changeuni: vav sheva lamed tsere qadma he

notes.note: The text quality is poor; however, no plausible dagesh is evident in the he.
BHL has a dagesh in the he. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Examine accent over bet. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: lamed sheva yod patah tsadi dagesh qamats bet qamats zaqef-qatan alef
change.changeuni: lamed sheva yod patah tsadi dagesh qamats bet qamats zaqef-qatan alef

notes.note: The text is of poor quality. The upper dot of the current zaqef-qatan is weak, but well-positioned. The lower dot is low for a revia.
BHL has a zaqef-qatan over the bet. BHLA has no entry for this word in this verse.

change.description: Remove maqaf from end of word.
change.refuni: dalet dagesh hiriq meteg yod maqaf
change.changeuni: dalet dagesh hiriq meteg yod

notes.note: No maqaf is evident in the LC.
BHL has a maqaf at the end of this word. BHLA has no maqaf at the end of this word.

change.description: Add dagesh to nun.
change.refuni: ayin segol lamed sheva yod vav holam nun hiriq tipeha yod final-nun
change.changeuni: ayin segol lamed sheva yod vav holam nun dagesh hiriq tipeha yod final-nun

notes.note: The dagesh in the nun is dark, well-sized, and well-positioned.
BHL has no dagesh in the nun. BHLA has a dagesh in the nun.

change.description: Change hiriq under yod to sheva.
change.refuni: he qamats alef patah revia yod hiriq lamed
change.changeuni: he qamats alef patah revia yod sheva lamed

notes.note: This word is the first of two instances of האיל in the verse. The upper dot of the putative sheva is reddish, but well-sized and well-positioned.
BHL has a hiriq under the yod. BHLA has a sheva under the yod.

change.description: Change zaqef-qatan to revia over alef.
change.refuni: he qamats alef patah zaqef-qatan yod hiriq lamed
change.changeuni: he qamats alef patah revia yod hiriq lamed

notes.note: This word is the second of two instances of האיל in the verse. Evidence of erasure appears over the revia, suggesting it was originally a zaqef-qatan.
BHL has a revia over the alef. BHLA has an entry for the first instance of האיל in this verse.

change.description: Remove maqaf from end of word.
change.refuni: vav sheva ayin patah mahapakh lamed maqaf
change.changeuni: vav sheva ayin patah mahapakh lamed

notes.note: No maqaf is evident at the end of this word. An odd circle does appear under/in the lamed, however.
BHL has no maqaf at the end of this word. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Examine possible dagesh in first yod.
change.refuni: vav patah meteg yod sheva het patah zayin dagesh sheva qof tsere meteg nun hiriq yod sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: vav patah meteg yod sheva het patah zayin dagesh sheva qof tsere meteg nun hiriq yod sof-pasuq

notes.note: The text quality is good. The first yod is fatter in its lower portion than the second yod. Although a slight, blurred protrusion occurs in the first yod in a position appropriate for a dagesh, the overall addition is a blob of ink, not a dagesh.
BHL has no dagesh in the first yod. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Examine first letter in word.
change.refuni: vav dagesh meteg bet sheva dalet patah bet dagesh sheva resh mahapakh vav holam
change.changeuni: vav dagesh meteg bet sheva dalet patah bet dagesh sheva resh mahapakh vav holam

notes.note: This is likely to be poor penmanship. The author suggests that the scribe mis-drew the second letter as a kaf and crudely corrected it to a bet, resulting in a gimel-like leg at the base of the vav. Note that the top of the vav is smeared onto the top of the bet. A gimel is extremely unlikely here.
BHL has an initial vav with a dagesh (acting as a shureq) and meteg followed by a bet with a sheva. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Add dagesh to he.
change.refuni: vav qamats alef holam meteg mem sheva resh qamats tevir he
change.changeuni: vav qamats alef holam meteg mem sheva resh qamats tevir he dagesh

notes.note: A dark, well-positioned dagesh appears in the he. The text is in good condition here.
BHL has no dagesh in the he. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Examine vowel below the lamed.
change.refuni: alef qamats he hataf-qamats lamed segol munah yod
change.changeuni: alef qamats he hataf-qamats lamed segol munah yod

notes.note: The lower dot of the putative segol below the lamed is reddish, but dark and well-positioned.
BHL has a tsere below the lamed. BHLA has a segol below the lamed.

change.description: Examine fourth letter, a probable vav. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: tet patah lamed sheva mem munah vav holam final-nun
change.changeuni: tet patah lamed sheva mem munah vav holam final-nun

notes.note: The fourth letter has only its top in ink. A clear shadow of a vav is present, however. This might be an erasure or might be an unintentional loss of ink, e.g., flaking off. The transcription assumes the loss of ink on the vav was unintentional and keeps the vav. This is assumption agrees with Dotan's BHL. A transcription note 't' is added to reflect the uncertainty of the decision, however.
BHL has a vav as the fourth letter. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Examine vowel below the resh and for possible splitting of word after the yod. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: vav sheva alef patah het hataf-patah resh tsere yod kaf tsere gereshayim final-nun
change.changeuni: vav sheva alef patah het hataf-patah resh tsere yod kaf tsere gereshayim final-nun

notes.note: The text is of good quality. Three dots appear in a horizontal line under the resh; the first two are in contact. This is probably poor penmanship. No maqaf is apparent between the yod and the kaf. Word gaps are hard to judge and no gap is obvious between the yod and the kaf. Splitting the word at the yod without a maqaf leaves the first part of the word without an accent, however. Adding note 't'.
BHL has a tsere below the resh; it has a maqaf after the yod, starting a new word, כן. BHLA has a tsere below the resh; it has a space after the yod, starting a new word, כן.

change.description: Examine vowel below the he.
change.refuni: lamed qamats he segol final-mem pashta
change.changeuni: lamed qamats he segol final-mem pashta

notes.note: Chipping of the ink has occurred in this word. The lower dot of the vowel beneath the he is light, but well-sized and well-positioned. The other dots of the segol show signs of ink chipping.
BHL has a segol below the he. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Examine sheva below vav. Add dagesh to vav. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: vav sheva kaf tsere final-nun maqaf
change.changeuni: vav dagesh sheva kaf tsere final-nun maqaf

notes.note: The upper dot of the putative sheva under the vav is very weak, but well-positioned. A very clear dagesh is present in the vav, however.
BHL has a sheva below the vav. BHLA has a sheva below the vav; however, it has a dagesh in the vav.

change.description: Examine first letter. Change vowel under the pe to patah. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: yod hiriq pe dagesh segol lamed maqaf
change.changeuni: yod hiriq pe dagesh patah lamed maqaf

notes.note: The text is in poor condition, with much chipping of ink. (The image shows the final yod of the previous word.) The outline of a chipped yod at the start of this word is evident. The vowel below the pe could be a patah, a segol, or qamats. The shape of the upper portion of the vowel is more like a broken bar than two dots; this would make the vowel either a patah or qamats. The lower portion of the vowel appears to be an erasure, rather than chipping, as the shape of the area is too large to be a chipped dot. The vowel will be transcribed as a patah and a note 't' added.
BHL has an initial yod and a segol under the pe. BHLA has an initial yod and a qamats under the pe.

change.description: Remove dagesh from shin.
change.refuni: vav patah het hataf-patah mem hiriq shin shin-dot dagesh hiriq zaqef-qatan yod final-mem
change.changeuni: vav patah het hataf-patah mem hiriq shin shin-dot hiriq zaqef-qatan yod final-mem

notes.note: No dagesh is evident in the shin.
BHL has a dagesh in the shin. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Add dagesh to samekh.
change.refuni: vav patah meteg nun dagesh hiriq samekh sheva ayin qamats gereshayim he
change.changeuni: vav patah meteg nun dagesh hiriq samekh dagesh sheva ayin qamats gereshayim he

notes.note: The quality of the text is good around this word. A dark, but ill-positioned, dagesh is in the samekh.
BHL has no dagesh in the samekh. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Change meteg to merkha under the first he.
change.refuni: he qamats meteg yod sheva tav qamats tevir he
change.changeuni: he qamats merkha yod sheva tav qamats tevir he

notes.note: The thin line after the qamats on the first he has the required northeast-to-southwest inclination of a merkha.
BHL has a merkha after the qamats under the first he. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: * Remove dagesh from shin. Add note 't'
change.refuni: he patah shin shin-dot dagesh holam munah ayin hataf-patah resh hiriq zaqef-qatan yod final-mem
change.changeuni: he patah shin shin-dot holam munah ayin hataf-patah resh hiriq zaqef-qatan yod final-mem

notes.note: The shin has only a very faint hint of a dagesh. (The shin-dot is not clear either.) The shin will be transcribed without the dagesh and a note 't' added.
BHL has a dagesh in the shin. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Remove maqaf from end of word.
change.refuni: vav sheva alef hiriq final-mem maqaf
change.changeuni: vav sheva alef hiriq final-mem

notes.note: No maqaf is apparent at the end of this word.
BHL has a maqaf at the end of this word. BHLA has no maqaf at the end of this word.

change.description: Remove meteg under the mem. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: mem patah meteg he hataf-patah lamed qamats kaf hataf-patah final-kaf qamats tipeha
change.changeuni: mem patah he hataf-patah lamed qamats kaf hataf-patah final-kaf qamats tipeha

notes.note: An erasure appears between the patah under the mem and the sheva under the he. A small lower dot of a possible meteg remains in the region. The current form of the text is transcribed without the meteg and a note 't' added.
BHL has no meteg under the mem. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Change merkha to munah under the bet.
change.refuni: bet dagesh qamats merkha alef
change.changeuni: bet dagesh qamats munah alef

notes.note: The sharp bend in the accent is distinct, making it a munah. The line emerging from the top leading arm of the alef is from a tipeha on the preceding word 8 of this verse.
BHL has a munah under the bet. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: * Change zaqef-qatan over the mem to revia. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: he patah shin shin-dot dagesh qamats mem patah zaqef-qatan yod hiriq final-mem
change.changeuni: he patah shin shin-dot dagesh qamats mem patah revia yod hiriq final-mem

notes.note: An erasure appears above the trailing edge of the mem. In the erasure is a fractured dot that might be considered part of a zaqef-qatan; however, this dot is offset too far to the left for it to be part of a zaqef-qatan. It will be transcribed as a revia.
BHL has a zaqef-qatan over the mem. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Move tipeha from under pe to under het.
change.refuni: he patah pe dagesh segol tipeha het qamats he
change.changeuni: he patah pe dagesh segol het qamats tipeha he

notes.note: The tipeha is clearly under the het.
BHL has the tipeha under the het after the qamats. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Change accent from munah to tipeha under the resh.
change.refuni: kaf dagesh patah dalet dagesh sheva bet qamats resh hiriq munah yod final-mem
change.changeuni: kaf dagesh patah dalet dagesh sheva bet qamats resh hiriq tipeha yod final-mem

notes.note: The accent under the resh is clearly a tipeha and not a munah.
BHL has a tipeha under the resh. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: * Examine the very ambiguous markings under the yod and resh. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: lamed sheva yod qamats meteg resh sheva alef tsere meteg nun hiriq yod sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: lamed sheva yod qamats meteg resh sheva alef tsere meteg nun hiriq yod sof-pasuq

notes.note: The text is of poor quality with lots of chipped ink in this region. Credible shevas appear under both the lamed and the resh. A very chipped potential qamats then meteg pair might be assumed under the yod. A light, smeared horizontal bar appears under the resh. It is too high to be transcribed as a patah. The current text's qamats then meteg will be retained. A transcription note 't' is added.

BHL has a qamats then meteg under the yod. It has a sheva under both the lamed and the resh. That is, the BHL does not consider the horizontal bar under the resh to be part of the text. BHLA has a qamats, meteg under the yod and a hataf-patah under the resh. That is, BHLA considers the horizontal bar under the resh to be part of the text.

change.description: Remove patah under the ayin.
change.refuni: yod tsere shin shin-dot darga vav dagesh ayin patah
change.changeuni: yod tsere shin shin-dot darga vav dagesh ayin

notes.note: No patah is evident under the ayin.
BHL has a patah under the ayin. BHLA has no patah under the ayin.

change.description: Add meteg under yod after the hiriq.
change.refuni: vav patah yod dagesh hiriq shin shin-dot sheva tav dagesh patah het hataf-patah vav dagesh qubuts tevir
change.changeuni: vav patah yod dagesh hiriq meteg shin shin-dot sheva tav dagesh patah het hataf-patah vav dagesh qubuts tevir

notes.note: A meteg is evident under the yod.
BHL has no meteg under the yod. BHLA has a meteg after the hiriq under the yod.

change.description: * Examine possible dagesh in tav. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: he vav holam dalet patah munah ayin patah tav qamats
change.changeuni: he vav holam dalet patah munah ayin patah tav qamats

notes.note: The text is chipped in this region. The patah under the ayin is clear. A possible chipped dagesh appears in the tav; however, it is too faint to be transcribed here.
BHL has a sheva under the ayin and dagesh in the tav. BHLA has a patah under the ayin and dagesh in the tav.

change.description: Change qadma to pashta on kaf.
change.refuni: vav sheva resh vav dagesh het hataf-patah final-kaf qamats qadma
change.changeuni: vav sheva resh vav dagesh het hataf-patah final-kaf qamats pashta

notes.note: The accent above the kaf is on the left side of the consonant.
BHL has a pashta over the kaf. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: * Examine accent under first nun. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: nun holam meteg tav sheva nun hiriq tevir yod final-mem
change.changeuni: nun holam meteg tav sheva nun hiriq tevir yod final-mem

notes.note: A light and chipped near-vertical mark is under the nun. It could be either a meteg or a merkha. Add note 't'.
BHL has a merkha under the first nun. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Remove hiriq from under yod.
change.refuni: mem hiriq yod dagesh hiriq shin sin-dot sheva resh qamats alef tsere meteg lamed sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: mem hiriq yod dagesh shin sin-dot sheva resh qamats alef tsere meteg lamed sof-pasuq

notes.note: No hiriq is apparent under the yod.
BHL has a hiriq under the yod. BHLA has no hiriq under the yod.

change.description: Remove dagesh from shin.
change.refuni: he patah shin shin-dot dagesh patah bet dagesh qamats meteg tav sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: he patah shin shin-dot patah bet dagesh qamats meteg tav sof-pasuq

notes.note: No dagesh is apparent in the shin.
BHL has a dagesh in the shin. BHLA has no dagesh in the shin.

change.description: Examine dagesh in shin.
change.refuni: he patah shin shin-dot dagesh patah bet dagesh qamats meteg tav sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: he patah shin shin-dot dagesh patah bet dagesh qamats meteg tav sof-pasuq

notes.note: A light dot appears in the appropriate place in the shin.
BHL has a dagesh in the shin. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Remove dagesh from shin.
change.refuni: bet dagesh patah shin shin-dot dagesh patah bet dagesh qamats meteg tav sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: bet dagesh patah shin shin-dot patah bet dagesh qamats meteg tav sof-pasuq

notes.note: No hint of a dagesh is present in the shin.
BHL has a dagesh in the shin. BHLA has no dagesh in the shin.

change.description: Remove dagesh from shin.
change.refuni: he patah shin shin-dot dagesh patah bet dagesh qamats etnachta tav
change.changeuni: he patah shin shin-dot patah bet dagesh qamats etnachta tav

notes.note: No hint of a dagesh appears in the shin.
BHL has a dagesh in the shin. BHLA has no dagesh in the shin.

change.description: Remove patah from he.
change.refuni: he patah zayin dagesh holam zaqef-qatan alef tav
change.changeuni: he zayin dagesh holam zaqef-qatan alef tav

notes.note: No patah is evident under the he.
BHL has a patah under the he. BHLA has no patah under the he.

change.description: Remove maqaf at end of word.
change.refuni: lamed sheva bet tsere merkha yod tav maqaf
change.changeuni: lamed sheva bet tsere merkha yod tav

notes.note: The Sefaria image is cropped, the line reference above is for the cropped image. This is the second of two לבית in this verse. No maqaf is evident for this, the second לבית in the verse.
BHL has no maqaf on this word. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Remove dagesh from first yod.
change.refuni: vav patah yod dagesh patah tsadi dagesh hiriq munah yod gimel vav dagesh
change.changeuni: vav patah yod patah tsadi dagesh hiriq munah yod gimel vav dagesh

notes.note: No dagesh is apparent in the first yod.
BHL has a dagesh in the first yod. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Remove dagesh from first yod.
change.refuni: vav patah yod dagesh patah ayin hataf-patah mem hiriq yod dalet segol mahapakh he qamats
change.changeuni: vav patah yod patah ayin hataf-patah mem hiriq yod dalet segol mahapakh he qamats

notes.note: No dagesh is apparent in the first yod. The upper leg of the lamed on the following line is unlikely to contain a dagesh.
BHL has a dagesh in the first yod. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Move munah from first to second vav.
change.refuni: ayin hataf-patah vav munah vav holam final-nun
change.changeuni: ayin hataf-patah vav vav munah holam final-nun

notes.note: The munah is under the second vav, probably because of the tail in the ayin. With care, the munah could have been placed under the first vav and ayin tail.
BHL has a munah under the first vav. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Examine possible dagesh in final vav. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: vav dagesh bet qamats nun qamats yod vav pashta
change.changeuni: vav dagesh bet qamats nun qamats yod vav pashta

notes.note: The text is in good condition near this word. A reddish dot appears in the correct vertical position in the final vav. The dot is faint and is positioned too far to the left.
BHL has no dagesh in the final vav. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Remove dagesh from nun.
change.refuni: he patah nun dagesh hiriq bet dagesh qamats tipeha alef
change.changeuni: he patah nun hiriq bet dagesh qamats tipeha alef

notes.note: No dagesh is apparent in the nun.
BHL has no dagesh in the nun. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Remove dagesh from first shin.
change.refuni: he patah shin shin-dot dagesh hiriq shin shin-dot dagesh hiriq munah yod
change.changeuni: he patah shin shin-dot hiriq shin shin-dot dagesh hiriq munah yod

notes.note: No dagesh is apparent in the first shin.
BHL has a dagesh in both shins. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Examine possible hataf-patah under het.
change.refuni: he patah het patah mem hiriq yod shin shin-dot hiriq yod pashta
change.changeuni: he patah het patah mem hiriq yod shin shin-dot hiriq yod pashta

notes.note: BHL has a hataf-patah under the het. BHLA has a patah under the het.

change.description: Remove maqaf from end of word.
change.refuni: lamed sheva ayin patah shin shin-dot sheva tav dagesh tsere munah yod maqaf
change.changeuni: lamed sheva ayin patah shin shin-dot sheva tav dagesh tsere munah yod

notes.note: No maqaf is evident at the end of this word. The word is the last on the line; however, a maqaf is usually inserted if the text requires it.
BHL has no maqaf at the end of this word. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Change pashta on final kaf to qadma.
change.refuni: vav sheva ayin hiriq mem dagesh sheva final-kaf qamats pashta
change.changeuni: vav sheva ayin hiriq mem dagesh sheva final-kaf qamats qadma

notes.note: The mark above the final kaf is not sufficiently to the left (postfix) to be transcribed as a pashta.
BHL has a clear qadma over the final kaf. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Change sheva under first kaf to hataf-patah.
change.refuni: vav dagesh meteg kaf sheva kaf qamats lamed maqaf
change.changeuni: vav dagesh meteg kaf hataf-patah kaf qamats lamed maqaf

notes.note: Under the first kaf the sheva is followed by a bar. This bar is slightly lighter, but appears to be deliberate and unerased. Hence the vowel will be transcribed as a hataf-patah.
BHL has a hataf-patah under the first kaf. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Change meteg under bet to merkha. Remove maqaf from end of word.
change.refuni: bet dagesh qamats meteg resh sheva kaf vav dagesh maqaf
change.changeuni: bet dagesh qamats merkha resh sheva kaf vav dagesh

notes.note: The image shows both this word, word 5, and its successor. The vertical accent under the bet has a very slight tail to the left. It also has a very slight northeast-to-southwest inclination. Thus it will be transcribed as a merkha. No maqaf appears at the end of this word, word 5.
BHL has a merkha under the bet and no maqaf at the end of this word. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Remove dagesh from qof.
change.refuni: vav patah yod dagesh hiriq qof dagesh qamats he hataf-patah lamed darga vav dagesh
change.changeuni: vav patah yod dagesh hiriq qof qamats he hataf-patah lamed darga vav dagesh

notes.note: A slight bulge appears at the top of the vertical stem of the qof. It is too slight to be transcribed as a dagesh.
BHL has a dagesh in the qof. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: * Add meteg between sheva and patah under the alef. Add ZWJ to force visual ordering to match LC. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: alef hataf-patah shin shin-dot segol munah resh
change.changeuni: alef hataf-patah ZWJ meteg shin shin-dot segol munah resh

notes.note: A slightly curved mark occurs between the sheva and the patah. The comma-like shape of the meteg is a very unusual. The markings below the alef probably mean a hataf-patah vowel with a meteg accent. Other instances of a meteg 'splitting' a hataf vowel occur in the LC.
BHL has sheva, then meteg, then patah under the alef. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Remove munah under zayin. Add accent segol to het.
change.refuni: zayin segol munah bet patah het
change.changeuni: zayin segol bet patah het segol

notes.note: The image includes the following word, הבקר, as part of the discussion below. No munah appears under the zayin. The accent segol on the het is clear. The revia over the following word is also evident.
BHL has no munah under the zayin; it has an accent segol on the het. On the next word BHL has a revia over the qof. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

A potentially "consensus" pointing for this word pair is munah then segol with the munah under the zayin of the first word and a segol over the resh of the second word. Of interest are the erasure splotches in the image under the zayin of the first word and over the resh of the second word. This suggests a delibrate correction of the LC by a scribe contrary to the "consensus" pointing. BHL, as expected, reflects the actual LC pointing of both words. BHS has a munah then revia pointing of the two words; agreeing with the "consensus" on the first word and the LC on the second. The pre-change UXLC pointing of the first word with a munah under the zayin and a revia over the resh probably reflects the pointing of the BHS from which the WLC was transcribed.

change.description: Replace mahapakh under resh with darga.
change.refuni: shin sin-dot qamats resh tsere mahapakh yod
change.changeuni: shin sin-dot qamats resh tsere darga yod

notes.note: The darga shape is distinctive.
BHL has a darga under the resh. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: * Accents under the bet and alef are uncertain. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: bet dagesh qamats meteg alef qamats merkha he
change.changeuni: bet dagesh qamats meteg alef qamats merkha he

notes.note: Both the bet and alef have vertical bars under them. The bar under the alef is significantly longer. Generally, this would indicate that the bar under the alef is a merkha as in the present text. (This is in contrast to BHL which has a meteg under the alef.)
BHL has a merkha under the bet and a meteg under the alef. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Replace patah under lamed with qamats.
change.refuni: lamed patah alef hataf-patah shin shin-dot tsere resh qamats tipeha he
change.changeuni: lamed qamats alef hataf-patah shin shin-dot tsere resh qamats tipeha he

notes.note: A qamats under the lamed is evident.
BHL has a qamats under the lamed. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Move geresh from ayin to alef.
change.refuni: yod hiriq shin shin-dot sheva mem qamats ayin tsere geresh alef lamed
change.changeuni: yod hiriq shin shin-dot sheva mem qamats ayin tsere alef geresh lamed

notes.note: The geresh is evident on the alef.
BHL has a geresh over the ayin. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Change merkha to tipeha under the nun.
change.refuni: bet dagesh sheva nun tsere merkha yod
change.changeuni: bet dagesh sheva nun tsere tipeha yod

notes.note: The mark under the nun is a tipeha. This is the first of three consecutive words being changed. Taken together, they change the accent pattern on the words from merkha-tipeha-merkha to tipeha-merkha-meteg.
BHL has a tipeha under the nun. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Change tipeha to merkha under the pe.
change.refuni: yod sheva he vav holam shin shin-dot qamats pe qamats tipeha tet
change.changeuni: yod sheva he vav holam shin shin-dot qamats pe qamats merkha tet

notes.note: The near-vertical line under the pe has a slight curvature to the left at its lower end; hence a merkha will be transcribed. This is the second of three consecutive words being changed. Taken together, they change the accent pattern on the words from merkha-tipeha-merkha to tipeha-merkha-meteg.
BHL has a tipeha under the pe. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Change merkha to meteg under mem.
change.refuni: mem segol merkha lamed segol final-kaf sheva maqaf
change.changeuni: mem segol meteg lamed segol final-kaf sheva maqaf

notes.note: The near-vertical lacks the northeast-to-southwest inclination of a merkha; it is transcribed as a meteg. This is the third of three consecutive words being changed. Taken together, they change the accent pattern on the words from merkha-tipeha-merkha to tipeha-merkha-meteg.
BHL has a meteg under the mem. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Examine etnachta position under second bet.
change.refuni: lamed sheva bet qamats bet etnachta vav holam
change.changeuni: lamed sheva bet qamats bet etnachta vav holam

notes.note: The etnachta is midway between the first and second bets.
BHL has the etnachta under the second bet. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Changes tipeha to etnachta under the nun.
change.refuni: shin shin-dot qamats nun hiriq tipeha yod final-mem
change.changeuni: shin shin-dot qamats nun hiriq etnachta yod final-mem

notes.note: The accent under the nun is clearly an etnachta.
BHL has hiriq then tipeha under the nun. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Move and change munah under the resh to a mahapakh under the yod.
change.refuni: vav sheva ayin segol shin sin-dot sheva resh hiriq munah yod final-mem
change.changeuni: vav sheva ayin segol shin sin-dot sheva resh hiriq yod mahapakh final-mem

notes.note: The accent under the resh is open to the right as expected of a mahapakh. A munah (the current text) would be open to the left.
BHL has a hiriq then munah under the resh. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Change tevir under kaf to merkha.
change.refuni: vav patah yod dagesh patah shin shin-dot sheva lamed hiriq yod kaf tevir vav dagesh final-mem
change.changeuni: vav patah yod dagesh patah shin shin-dot sheva lamed hiriq yod kaf merkha vav dagesh final-mem

notes.note: The near-vertical bar under the kaf has a very slight northeast-to-southwest inclination and is longer than a typical meteg. The interior of the lamed has an erasure that touches small portions of the lamed and yod.
BHL has a merkha under the kaf. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Add pashta to yod.
change.refuni: vav sheva yod segol tav segol resh pashta
change.changeuni: vav sheva yod segol pashta tav segol resh pashta

notes.note: A pashta is evident above the yod.
BHL has a pashta above the yod. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: * Move meteg below the qof to below the zayin. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: het hataf-patah zayin qamats qof meteg vav holam sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: het hataf-patah zayin qamats meteg qof vav holam sof-pasuq

notes.note: The meteg is between the zayin and the qof. Space is available to write the meteg below the qof.
BHL has the meteg below the qof. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Remove qadma over tav; add pashta to he.
change.refuni: ayin patah tav dagesh qamats qadma he
change.changeuni: ayin patah tav dagesh qamats he pashta

notes.note: The accent is clearly above the he; it is distinctly postfix and is therefore a pashta.
BHL has a qadma over the tav. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Change patah under first he to hataf-patah.
change.refuni: mem tsere meteg he patah kaf dagesh holam he hataf-patah nun hiriq meteg yod final-mem sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: mem tsere meteg he hataf-patah kaf dagesh holam he hataf-patah nun hiriq meteg yod final-mem sof-pasuq

notes.note: The sheva component of the hataf-patah is clear.
BHL has a patah under the first he. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Change darga to tevir under pe.
change.refuni: tet patah pe dagesh qamats darga final-mem
change.changeuni: tet patah pe dagesh qamats tevir final-mem

notes.note: The tevir is evident.
BHL has a tevir under the pe. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Add telisha-qetana over resh.
change.refuni: mem patah ayin sheva resh qamats bet qamats he telisha-qetana
change.changeuni: mem patah ayin sheva resh qamats telisha-qetana bet qamats he telisha-qetana

notes.note: The telisha-qetana over the resh is evident. A slightly lighter and higher circle appears over the mem-ayin pair. This is a masorah circle and isn't transcribed here.
BHL has a telisha-qetana only over the he. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Change darga to meteg under the resh.
change.refuni: ayin segol shin sin-dot sheva resh hiriq darga yod final-mem
change.changeuni: ayin segol shin sin-dot sheva resh hiriq meteg yod final-mem

notes.note: The accent under the mark is not squiggly like a darga. It might be a merkha, but it has no northeast-to-southwest inclination and is short. It will be transcribed as a meteg.
BHL has a darga under the resh. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Change zaqef-qatan to revia over he.
change.refuni: lamed sheva tet patah he tsere zaqef-qatan resh
change.changeuni: lamed sheva tet patah he tsere revia resh

notes.note: A smudge appears above the clear dot above the he. The smudge is very diffuse and too far to the right to be associated with the dot as a part of a zaqef-qatan.
BHL has a revia over the he. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Remove dagesh from tsadi. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: nun sheva bet meteg vav dagesh kaf patah dalet sheva nun segol alef tsadi dagesh patah zaqef-qatan resh
change.changeuni: nun sheva bet meteg vav dagesh kaf patah dalet sheva nun segol alef tsadi patah zaqef-qatan resh

notes.note: The word נבוכדנאצר normally has a dagesh in the tsadi. The dagesh is usually placed below the upper arms of the tsadi as displayed in the modern font. Here the tsadi has a reddish blob in between its upper arms. The blob is larger than expected and positioned too far to the left. A dagesh will not be transcribed in the tsadi; however, a note 't' will be added.
BHL has a dagesh in the tsadi. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Remove dagesh from shin.
change.refuni: he qamats shin shin-dot dagesh patah mem dagesh qamats he pashta
change.changeuni: he qamats shin shin-dot patah mem dagesh qamats he pashta

notes.note: No dagesh is apparent in the shin.
BHL has no dagesh in the shin. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Add meteg under vav.
change.refuni: vav dagesh lamed sheva zayin patah resh sheva ayin hataf-patah final-kaf qamats merkha
change.changeuni: vav dagesh meteg lamed sheva zayin patah resh sheva ayin hataf-patah final-kaf qamats merkha

notes.note: The text is of good quality and clearly shows a meteg under the vav.
BHL has a meteg under the vav. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Remove first pashta from tav.
change.refuni: alef hataf-patah bet holam tav segol pashta yod final-kaf qamats pashta
change.changeuni: alef hataf-patah bet holam tav segol yod final-kaf qamats pashta

notes.note: The mark over the bet might be taken as either a holam or pashta; it can't be both. The connection between the black (presumably holam) dot and the bet is faint, making a pashta unlikely. No pashta is over the tav. It will be removed.
BHL has a holam on the bet and a first pashta over the tav. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Examine trace vertical line under the dalet.
change.refuni: vav sheva he hiriq gimel dagesh hiriq munah yod dalet vav dagesh
change.changeuni: vav sheva he hiriq gimel dagesh hiriq munah yod dalet vav dagesh

notes.note: A faint vertical line appears under the dalet. It is much lighter than any other parts of this word and appears to be an erasure. The 6-th word of following verse, Deut 17:10.6, יגידו, has a clear meteg under the dalet. The scribe may have mistaken which word he was accenting, written a meteg on this word, discovered his error, and erased the erroneous meteg.
BHL has no meteg under the dalet; Deut 17:10.6 has a meteg under the dalet. BHLA has no entry for this verse or for Deut 17:10.

change.description: Remove sheva from under first nun. Add note 'c'.
change.refuni: mem hiriq bet dagesh hiriq nun sheva yod qamats mem hiriq revia yod final-nun
change.changeuni: mem hiriq bet dagesh hiriq nun yod qamats mem hiriq revia yod final-nun

notes.note: BHL has a sheva under the first nun in the qere. BHLA has no sheva under the first nun in the qere; it also agrees with the UXLC ketiv.

change.description: Examine weak maqaf following the final nun, the second consonant, in the LC word. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: mem final-nun maqaf
change.changeuni: mem final-nun maqaf

notes.note: The image is the LC body text which consists of the ketiv consonants, מן המערה (2 words), with the qere pointing. The qere consonants, מהמערה, appear to the left of the column. Words 6, 7, 8 of the UXLC represent both the LC body text and the qere consonants; words 6, 7 contain the ketiv variants for this image; UXLC word 6 is the first ketiv variant, shown in the Reference above. This change is to the UXLC word 6, מן־, the first ketiv word. The maqaf between the final nun following the first mem is very faint in the image. A note 't' will be added following the maqaf in ketiv word 6.
BHL agrees with the UXLC text in both the qere and ketiv variants. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Remove meteg under he. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: he hiriq meteg yod alef maqaf
change.changeuni: he hiriq yod alef maqaf

notes.note: The image is the LC body text which consists of the ketiv consonants, הוא־והיא (2 words), with the qere pointing. The first qere consonants, היא appear the right of the column, the second qere consonants, והוא , appear to the left of the column. Words 6, 7, 8, 9 of the UXLC represent both the LC body text and the qere consonants; words 6, 7 contain the ketiv variants for this image; UXLC word 8 is the first qere word, shown in the Reference/Change above. This change is to the UXLC word 8, a qere word. No meteg is apparent under the he, only a hiriq. The evidence for a maqaf between the alef and the second vav is weak. A note 't' will be added to this first qere word; this note about the maqaf also applies to the UXLC ketiv word 6.
BHL agrees with this change in both the qere and ketiv. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Remove maqaf from ketiv word.
change.refuni: mem final-nun maqaf
change.changeuni: mem final-nun

notes.note: The image is the LC body text which consists of the ketiv consonants, מן־בת־ (2 words), with the qere pointing. The qere consonants, מבת, appear to the left of the column. Words 2, 3, 4 of the UXLC represent both the LC body text and the qere consonants; words 3, 4 contain the ketiv variants for this image; UXLC word 2 is the first ketiv variant, shown in the Reference/Change above. No maqaf is present between the final nun and the following bet in the image. This change removes the maqaf from the UXLC ketiv word in position 2, מן־ .
BHL agrees with this change in both the qere and ketiv. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Change order of meteg/sheva on vav to improve robustness of display.
change.refuni: vav meteg sheva yod patah ayin hataf-patah nun tsere final-mem zinor
change.changeuni: vav sheva meteg yod patah ayin hataf-patah nun tsere final-mem zinor

notes.note: No change to the text should be apparent.
BHL has the same text. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Change order of meteg/sheva on vav to improve robustness of display.
change.refuni: vav meteg sheva yod tsere dalet sheva ayin revia vav dagesh
change.changeuni: vav sheva meteg yod tsere dalet sheva ayin revia vav dagesh

notes.note: No change to the text should be apparent.
BHL has the same text. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Change order of meteg/sheva on vav to improve robustness of display.
change.refuni: vav meteg sheva yod patah het hataf-patah lamed holam meteg pe vav dagesh sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: vav sheva meteg yod patah het hataf-patah lamed holam meteg pe vav dagesh sof-pasuq

notes.note: No change to the text should be apparent.
BHL has the same text. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Change order of meteg/sheva on vav to improve robustness of display.
change.refuni: vav meteg sheva yod segol ayin hataf-segol shin shin-dot qamats meteg nun vav dagesh sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: vav sheva meteg yod segol ayin hataf-segol shin shin-dot qamats meteg nun vav dagesh sof-pasuq

notes.note: No change to the text should be apparent.
BHL has the same text. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Change order of meteg/sheva on vav to improve robustness of display.
change.refuni: vav meteg sheva yod segol ayin hataf-segol shin shin-dot qamats meteg nun vav dagesh sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: vav sheva meteg yod segol ayin hataf-segol shin shin-dot qamats meteg nun vav dagesh sof-pasuq

notes.note: No change to the text should be apparent.
BHL has the same text. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Change order of meteg/sheva on vav to improve robustness of display.
change.refuni: vav meteg sheva alef segol tav maqaf
change.changeuni: vav sheva meteg alef segol tav maqaf

notes.note: No change to the text should be apparent.
BHL has the same text. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Remove dagesh from shin. [Repeat]
change.refuni: he patah shin shin-dot dagesh patah bet dagesh qamats revia tav
change.changeuni: he patah shin shin-dot patah bet dagesh qamats revia tav

notes.note: This change appears in Changes file 2023.10.19 - 2023.08.10 - 3, but was not implemented due to error. No dagesh is apparent in the shin.
BHL has a dagesh in the shin. BHLA has no dagesh in the shin.

change.description: Remove maqaf from qere word.
change.refuni: ayin patah lamed maqaf
change.changeuni: ayin patah lamed

notes.note: This word is the first qere component of a two word qere, עַל־כֵּ֥ן. The two qere words are part of qere-without-ketiv variant, where the second qere word, כֵּ֥ן, has no matching ketiv word. The tsere, merkha pointings under the lamed belong to the second qere whose letters, כן, are shown in the left margin along with the Masoretic note: qere and no ketiv.
BHL has a maqaf at the end of this word. BHLA has no maqaf at the end of this word.

change.description: Positioning of etnachta under nun is uncertain. Add note 't' after nun.
change.refuni: he patah meteg het hataf-patah nun qubuts etnachta yod vav holam tav
change.changeuni: he patah meteg het hataf-patah nun qubuts etnachta yod vav holam tav

notes.note: The positioning of the etnachta under the nun is uncertain; it might belong to the yod because the etnachta is shadowed by the foot of the nun. Add note 't'. The uncertainty was noted by Daniel Holman and Avi Kadish as well as the author.
BHL has the etnachta under the nun. BHLA has no entry for this verse.
